participant_1.background:

our class is planning a trip to japan.
I am trying to maintain a healthy weight by eating well and exercising regularly.
I have a lust for my neighbor's pool boy, and a need to be creative.
I am not close to my family, but I have a great relationship with my fiance.

on weekends i like to go hiking.
i have a harsh inner critic.
my country is russia.
I only speak one language, but I love watching action movies with my family on Netflix.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you?
I'm doing great, thanks.  I'm excited about our upcoming trip to Japan.
That sounds awesome! I've always wanted to visit Japan. What are you looking forward to seeing there?
I'm really looking forward to seeing the culture and the food.  I've heard that the food is amazing.
Yes, the food is incredible!  I'm particularly fond of sushi.
I love sushi too!  What other types of food do you like?
I also like ramen, tempura, and udon.
Those all sound delicious!  I can't wait to try them all.
I'm sure I won't.  I'm also looking forward to hiking in the mountains.
That sounds like a great way to experience the natural beauty of Japan.
It does!  I'm also excited to learn more about the culture.
I'm sure you'll have a great time.
Thanks!  I'm looking forward to it.
